name: Asteroid Belt Assault
description:
Game made by me while reading the 'XNA 4.0 Game Development by Example: Beginner's Guide, by Kurt Jaegers' book, I made this game using the monogame framework.

Book's link: https://www.packtpub.com/game-development/xna-40-game-development-example-beginn...

Keys:

  • Space - Shot
  • Directional keys - Move
